Name: Pirate of Madagascar Island
About the game: Pirate of Madagascar Island is a third-person exploration game which may seem like adventure and open world game. In this game you are pirate in the Madagascar island and need to roam around and find the portal to jump to the next level. You may find coins as point and enemies which are going to guard them. You will get to see different cool environments and explore it. I hope you are going to love it. key Features For fans of Pirate of the Caribbean, sea of thieves or Pirate related games. Its kind of exploration type of game. A short game (about an hour and a half) focused on exploration with some path finding and platforming.
